properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Intracoastal City to Cameron LA out 20 NM; Calcasieu Lake; Coastal waters from Cameron LA to High Island TX out 20 NM; Vermilion Bay; Coastal waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA out 20 NM; Sabine Lake
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 17 at 12:31AM CST until February 17 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dense fog will reduce visibility to one mile or less.

* WHERE...Portions of the inner coastal waters and the coastal
lakes and bays of the Gulf of Mexico.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Low visibility will make navigation difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Marine fog will be patchy in nature and
will be blowing. As such, rapid changes in visibility will be
possible over short distances and times.
properties.instruction:
If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING
